data.title: Southwest Airlines Rapid Rewards®
data.text:
*Available only to residential electric customers in Connecticut, Maine, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, and natural gas customers in California, Georgia, Indiana, Kentucky, Michigan, and Virginia. Southwest® Rapid Rewards® points are only available to new customers who have not been previously been enrolled with XOOM Energy in the last 6 months. To receive rewards, you must be a Southwest Rapid Rewards Member. This offer may not be transferred or combined with any other offer. Additional eligibility requirements, terms and conditions may apply. Please see Terms and Conditions which can be found on the Product Details section associated with the airline rewards product on the XOOM Energy website, as well as your Welcome Communication.

Enrollment bonus: you will earn 10,000 Rapid Rewards points for each electric account you enroll or 5,000 Rapid Rewards points for each natural gas account you enroll after the account has been active for 2 months. Bonus points will appear in your Rapid Rewards account within eight weeks after you earn your enrollment bonus. Bonus points do not count towards tier status or Companion Pass® status.

Ongoing Rewards: you will earn 2 Rapid Rewards points for every $1 charged on the supply portion of your monthly electric or natural gas bill.

Please note active accounts are defined as those that are (i) billing more than $0 and (ii) for which we have not received a request to discontinue service or change products.
